locations.name: Mt. Everest, Nepal
locations.activities: Trekking, Yak Riding, Visit Monasteries
locations.description: the highest point on Earth, rises above the clouds at 8,848.86 meters (29,031.7  feet), offering a breathtaking view of the world

locations.name: Mt. Annapurna, Nepal
locations.activities: Trekking, Skiing, Visit Local Villages
locations.description: a towering, majestic peak in the Himalayas, renowned for its dramatic and rugged beauty, standing at 8,091 meters (26,545 feet) above sea level.

locations.name: Mount Fuji, Japan
locations.activities: Trekking, Visit Fuji Five Lakes, Explore Hakone
locations.description: Japan's iconic, perfectly symmetrical stratovolcano, soaring gracefully to 3,776 meters and symbolizing natural beauty and cultural significance.

locations.name: Mt. Matterhorn, Switzerland
locations.activities: trekking, snowboarding, skiing
locations.description: Striking, pyramid-shaped peak in the Swiss Alps, famed for its dramatic profile and towering presence at 4,478 meters.

locations.name: Mt. Robson, Canada
locations.activities: trekking, Backcountry Skiing, Scenic Drives
locations.description: Canada's highest peak, renowned for its towering, snow-capped summit and dramatic vertical relief in the rugged Canadian Rockies.
locations.food: elk stew, bison burgers, and berry pies

locations.name: Sahara Desert, Africa
locations.activities: Camel trekking, desert camping, Hot air Ballooning
locations.description: a vast and arid expanse of golden sand dunes and rugged terrain, stretching across North Africa with an awe-inspiring, desolate beauty.

locations.name: Antartica
locations.activities: Glacier Hiking, Wildlife Watching, Ice Climbing
locations.description: vast, icy wilderness at the Earth's southernmost point, characterized by its extreme cold, pristine landscapes, and unique ecosystems.
locations.food: preserved meats, dried fruits, instant soups

locations.name: Gobi Desert, Mongolia
locations.activities: Camel trekking, Sand Dune Climbing, Visit Dinosaur Fossil Sites
locations.description: expanse in northern China and southern Mongolia, characterized by its harsh climate, diverse landscapes, and unique flora and fauna.
locations.food: mutton stew, Mongolian BBQ, milk tea

locations.name: Arabian Desert, Saudi Arabia
locations.activities: Dune Bashing, Bedouin Culture Tours, Camel rides
locations.description: vast, arid expanse covering much of the Arabian Peninsula, known for its sweeping sand dunes, harsh climate, and rich cultural heritage.

locations.name: Great Australian Desert, Australia
locations.activities: Stargazing, Bushwalking, 4WD Adventures
locations.description: vast, arid region comprising multiple deserts, known for its harsh environment, unique wildlife, and rich Aboriginal cultural heritage.

locations.name: Maldives
locations.activities: plankton, snorkeling, water-sports
locations.description: turquoise lagoons with crystal clear water protected by reefs that house unique and spectacular marine life.

locations.name: French Polynesia
locations.activities: lagoonarium, belvedere lookout, water gardens
locations.description: a stunning overseas collectivity of France located in the South Pacific Ocean. Comprising 118 islands and atolls, it's known for its vibrant marine life, crystal-clear lagoons, and lush mountainous landscapes.

locations.name: Phuket
locations.activities: elephant sanctuary, scuba diving, night market
locations.description: destination known for its stunning beaches, vibrant nightlife, and rich cultural heritage.
locations.food: pad thai, fried rice, mango sticky rice

locations.name: Punta cana
locations.activities: ecological reserve, bavaro, scape park
locations.description: popular resort town located on the easternmost tip of the Dominican Republic, known for its stunning white-sand beaches, crystal-clear turquoise waters, and all-inclusive resorts.
locations.food: Sancocho, La Bandera, Los Tres Golpes

locations.name: Mykonos, Greece
locations.activities: matoyianni street, windmills, little Venice
locations.description: renowned for its vibrant nightlife, stunning beaches, and charming whitewashed architecture.

locations.name: Areni Village, Armenia
locations.activities: wine tasting, St. Astvatsatsin (13th-century church), Areni Wine Festival (in October)
locations.description: This hidden gem is only an hour and a half from the capital city of Yerevan and boasts the title of 'birthplace of winemaking'! Wander the vineyards, try the local wine, visit the nearby Noravank Monastery, or check out Areni-1 Cave, the oldest winery in the world!

locations.name: Cappadocia, Turkey
locations.activities: hiking, hot-air ballooning, exploring ancient rock formations, visiting castles
locations.description: This exciting region of Turkey is famous for hot-air ballooning and the ancient rock formations that have developed millions of years ago!

locations.name: Sigangli Cave, China
locations.activities: cave exploring, hiking, walking in the forest
locations.description: Within the Nan Rolling River National Nature Reserve lies the incredible Sigangli Cave! Spend the morning exploring the cave, but save time to see the nearby bridge and walk through the forested hills.

locations.name: Rurrenabaque, Bolivia
locations.activities: rainforest tour, ecotourism, river trips
locations.description: Rurrenabaque is nestled in the Bolivian rainforest and offers the chance for memorable ecotourism adventures. Whether your taste is a rainforest excursion, a boat ride on the Yacuma River, or a stay in a charming Bolivian town, Rurrenabaque has something for you!

locations.name: Masai Mara, Kenya
locations.activities: safari
locations.description: If you've ever wanted to watch a lioness hunt for her prey, see giraffes running across the plains, or hear zebras bray as they trot along, you simply must come to Masai Mara! Safaris are available to suit any interest!

locations.name: Prague, Czechia
locations.activities: staromestske nameste, prague castle, Charles bridge
locations.description: famed for its stunning Gothic, Baroque, and Romanesque architecture. The city's centerpiece is the Old Town.
locations.food: scvickova na smetana, trdelnik, vepro knedlo zelo

locations.name: New York City, USA
locations.activities: urban exploration, Broadway, museums, shopping, restaurants, most anything modern humans can imagine
locations.description: New York City, sometimes referred to as the 'capital of the world' speaks for itself, but you have to come here to experience everything you've always heard about. Some of the world's greatest restaurants, most famous museums, and finest shops are located on the island of Manhattan. Come for Broadway and The Met, but stay for the pizza and the late-night clubs.
locations.food: fine dining, delicious local cuisine, pizza

locations.name: Vienna, Austria
locations.activities: urban exploration, theater/opera, historical sites, museums, wine tasting, coffee houses
locations.description: Known as the 'Heart of Europe', Vienna has something to offer any visitor. Whether you want to take in an opera or a play, spend your days inside world-famous museums, or simply sit in a coffee shop and people watch, the streets of Vienna are calling! And just outside of town is the famous wine country of Kahlenberg, where you can sample the local wines as you look out over the vineyards.

locations.name: Tokyo, Japan
locations.activities: Visit the Imperial Palace, Visit TeamLab Borderless, Explore Akihabara
locations.description: A dynamic metropolis blending ultramodern skyscrapers with historic temples, offering a rich tapestry of culture, technology, and tradition.

locations.name: Lisbon, Portugal
locations.activities: Explore Belém, Wander Alfama, Ride Tram 28, Explore Sintra, Attend a Fado Performance
locations.description: Lisbon is a vibrant, sun-kissed city with a rich blend of historic charm, colorful architecture, and a lively cultural scene set along the scenic Tagus River
locations.food: Pastéis de Nata, Bacalhau à Brás, Bifana, Arroz de Marisco
